titleStmt.title: A sermon preach't at Christs-Church Dublin before the generall convention of Ireland. May 24. 1660. By Henry Jones D.D. Vicechancellour of the University of Dublin and Bishop of Clogher.
titleStmt.author: Jones, Henry, 1605-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.C. for J. Crook at the Ship in Pauls Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
